articles.author: By Chris Lau, Nadeen Ebrahim and Andrew Raine, CNN
articles.title: US launches strikes in Iraq and Syria as Israel-Hamas war rages: Live updates - CNN
articles.description: The US says it has struck 85 targets linked to Iran-backed militias in Iraq and Syria in response to a drone strike in Jordan that killed three American soldiers. Follow for live updates.
articles.content: Pope Francis on Saturday reiterated the Catholic Churchs condemnation of every form of anti-Judaism and anti-semitism, in a letter released by the Vatican addressed to my Jewish brothers and sisters … [+1208 chars]

articles.title: Kingsbury backs out of talks to be OC of Raiders - ESPN
articles.description: Former Cardinals coach Kliff Kingsbury has withdrawn himself from consideration for the Raiders' offensive coordinator position after contract talks broke down.
articles.content:
Kliff Kingsbury has withdrawn from consideration for the Las Vegas Raiders' offensive coordinator position, his agent, Erik Burkhardt, told ESPN's Adam Schefter.

articles.author: Pamela McClintock
articles.title: Box Office: Matthew Vaughn and Apple’s Big-Budget ‘Argylle’ Bombing With $16.5M U.S. Debut - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Audiences slapped the $200 million movie with a C+ CinemaScore, but it will still top the North American box office, thanks to little competition.
articles.content:
Spurned by many critics and consumers alike, Matthew Vaughn‘s pricey spy-comedy Argylle is bombing at the North American box office in the biggest miss to date for Apple’s theatrical ambitions.

articles.title: Evaluating every NFL coaching hire of the 2024 cycle - The Boston Globe
articles.description: Though offense is king in today’s NFL, five of the eight new coaches have defensive backgrounds.

articles.title: 'I'm losing engine.' Pilot reported trouble before Clearwater plane crash. - Tampa Bay Times
articles.description: Air traffic recording and flight logs illuminate the harrowing moments before and after the plane went down, killing the pilot and two on the ground.
articles.content:
CLEARWATER Moments before a small airplane fell from the sky and plowed into a Clearwater mobile home park Thursday evening, the pilot made a panicked emergency radio call.
